name: Onna no Ko to Misshitsu ni Itara **shichau Kamoshirenai
summary: What will you do when you are locked inside a room with your dream girl? Live through the different situations in this game. You have control over two worlds. In your dream world, you become a fairy who must help the girls to escape from the locked room, your success affects the outcome of your relationship in the real world. All environments and characters are in 3D, and all the dialogues are voiced. You instruct the girls through inputting words into the system. You can change your perspective by using the gyro-sensor. Spot the items that have been hidden in a blind spot. With the camera feature, capture the enchanting images of the girls and keep them in your image gallery.
